TrcCommonLib.trclib

Class TrcTaskMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • TrcCommonLib.trclib.TrcTaskMgr

  • public class TrcTaskMgr
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods for the callers to register/unregister cooperative multi-tasking tasks. It manages these tasks and will work with the cooperative multi-tasking scheduler to run these tasks.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  TrcTaskMgr.Task
      Any class that is registering a task must implement this interface.
      static class  TrcTaskMgr.TaskObject
      This class implements TaskObject that will be created whenever a class is registered as a cooperative multi-tasking task.
      static class  TrcTaskMgr.TaskType
      These are the task type TrcTaskMgr supports:

    • Field Summary

      static long OUTPUT_THREAD_INTERVAL

      This method returns the global instance of TrcTaskMgr.

      This method prints the performance metrics of all tasks with the given tracer.
      void shutdown()
      This method is called at the end of the robot program (FtcOpMode in FTC or FrcRobotBase in FRC) to terminate all threads if any and remove all task from the task list.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static TrcTaskMgr getInstance()
        This method returns the global instance of TrcTaskMgr. If Task Manager does not exist yet, one is created.
        Returns:
        global instance of TrcTaskMgr.

      • createTask

        public TrcTaskMgr.TaskObject createTask(java.lang.String taskName,
                                        TrcTaskMgr.Task task)
        This method creates a TRC task. If the TRC task is registered as a STANDALONE task, it is run on a separately created thread. Otherwise, it is run on the main robot thread as a cooperative multi-tasking task.
        Parameters:
        taskName - specifies the task name.
        task - specifies the Task interface for this task.
        Returns:
        created task object.

      • terminateAllThreads

        public void terminateAllThreads()
        This method is mainly for FtcOpMode to call at the end of the opMode loop because runOpMode could be terminated before shutdown can be called especially if stopMode code is doing logging I/O (e.g. printPerformanceMetrics). This provides an earlier chance for us to stop all task threads before it's too late.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        This method is called at the end of the robot program (FtcOpMode in FTC or FrcRobotBase in FRC) to terminate all threads if any and remove all task from the task list.

      • executeTaskType

        public void executeTaskType(TrcTaskMgr.TaskType type,
                            TrcRobot.RunMode mode)
        This method is called by the main robot thread to enumerate the task list and calls all the tasks that matches the given task type.
        Parameters:
        type - specifies the task type to be executed.
        mode - specifies the robot run mode.

      • printTaskPerformanceMetrics

        public void printTaskPerformanceMetrics(TrcDbgTrace tracer)
        This method prints the performance metrics of all tasks with the given tracer.
        Parameters:
        tracer - specifies the tracer to be used for printing the task performance metrics.
